thread.title: An Amazing Experience!
thread.title_full: An Amazing Experience! - Review of The Pierre, A Taj Hotel, New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: 98pujam
title: An Amazing Experience!
text: We had a wonderful stay at The Pierre! From the time we checked in, the whole process was seamless! Kevin upgraded us to the Central Park view up on the 38th floor. The view was spectacular! The staff from the doorman to the front desk, housekeeping, concierge simply exceptional!! Anisha the front desk manager was outstanding! And did I mention the location!! If you are looking for a romantic stay this is the place to be! I highly recommend it!
